questionTitle: It is usually better not to ________ things, in case they are not returned.
It's six years now since the Socialists came to ________ in that country.
He was killed in a car ________.
It's nearly two years since I last ________ to a dentist.
The civil servant ________ his post because he disagreed with the Minister.
I don't know where he lives now; he left this area many years ________.
There was a sudden loud ________ which made everyone jump.
The bill came to over a thousand dollars ________.
The junior Minister's remarks on television about the strike ________ the Prime Minister so much that he was sacked.
The police have issued a full ________ of the murderer.
A lot of people find ________ art very difficult to understand.
He was ________ of understanding anything which involved numbers.
If there's ________ for complaint, please inform the manager.
There was ________ enough cake for all of us to have a very small slice.
He was bitten by a mosquito, but he made things worse by ________ the bite all the time.
Contrary ________ my expectations there was no need to be uneasy about the results of the match.
She prides herself ________ her clean house.
Your conclusions are not consistent ________ the facts.
The coin was too small ________ in the grass.
anwers: for John not to see it

questionTitle: This journal ________ in Poland for more than twelve years by now.
